Name: VR Puppet Game
About the game: VR Puppet Game is meant to be speedrun. It is meant to enrage you. Become a marionettist in VR and get your marionette across a complex series of obstacle courses. Jump around, fall into portals, and guide your puppet to the next level. Give your marionette a sword. Fight some puppet-dudes and defeat the giant bosses.
